Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.external.straightskeleton.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 note: the defn of weight here is a little strange, can alter it later as long as the uphill vector calculation is updated too.
    Author:
    twak
